gobblin.runtime.instance

Class SimpleGobblinInstanceEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.instance.SimpleGobblinInstanceEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instrumentable, GobblinInstanceEnvironment

    public class SimpleGobblinInstanceEnvironment
extends Object
implements GobblinInstanceEnvironment
    A barebones implementation of GobblinInstanceEnvironment used to inject system configurations to StandardGobblinInstanceDriver.
